name: Impossible Trivia for Bible Experts Multiple Choice Quiz | Religion | 10 Questions

questions.text: What kind of tree did Absalom, a son of David, get his hair caught in, according to the New King James Version of the Bible?
questions.explanation:
Terebinth.

	2 Samuel 18:9- "Then Absalom met the servants of David. Absalom rode on a mule. The mule went under the thick boughs of a great terebinth [tree], and his head caught in the terebinth, so he was left hanging between heaven and earth. And the mule under him went on."

questions.text: What or who were Muppim, Huppim, and Ard?
options: The words of a chant of the priest of Baal.
They were not in the Bible
questions.explanation:
Sons of Benjamin.

	Genesis 46:21- "The sons of Benjamin were Belah, Becher, Ashbel, Gera, Naaman, Ehi, Rosh, Muppim, Huppim, and Ard."

questions.text: "Jesus wept" (John 11:35) is known as the shortest verse in the New Testament. Where can the shortest Old Testament verse in the New King James translation be found?
questions.explanation:
1 Chronicles.

	Actually, there are two equally short verses in 1 Chronicles that both have only three words. 1 Chronicles 1:1- "Adam, Seth, Enosh.", and 1 Chronicles 1:25- "Eber, Peleg, Reu."

questions.text: What is the longest word or name in the Bible?
questions.explanation:
Mahershalalhashbaz.

	The word is eighteen letters long! Isaiah 8:3 - "Then I went to the prophetess, and she conceived and bore a son. Then the Lord said to me, 'Call his name Maher-Shalal-Hash-Baz.'"

questions.text: The prophet Jeremiah had a secretary. What was this secretary's name?
questions.explanation:
Baruch & Barukh.

	Baruch is mentioned in Jeremiah 36:4, 10, 14-19 as having written down words that Jeremiah had dictated to him. Baruch then read the "memo" to Michaiah and his scribes, Elishama, Delaiah, Elnathan, Gemariah, Zedekiah, and some other princes.

questions.text: How many men in the Bible are named "Dodo"?
questions.explanation:
Three.

	Each of these "Dodos" is referred to once in the Bible. Judges 10:1, 2; 2 Samuel 23:9; 23:24.

questions.text: The word "ball" is mentioned only once in the whole Bible. Where?
questions.explanation:
Isaiah.

	Isaiah 22:18- "He [the Lord] will surely turn violently and toss you like a ball into a large country."

questions.text: What were the names of Nahor's two oldest sons?
questions.explanation:
Huz and Buz.

	Genesis 22: 20, 21- "Now it came to pass after these things that it was told to Abraham, saying, 'Indeed, Milcah also has borne children to your brother Nahor: Huz his firstborn, Buz his brother, Kemuel the father of Aram.'"

questions.text: What was the name of the commander of Abimelech's army in Genesis?
questions.explanation:
Phichol.

	Genesis 21:22- "And it came to pass at that time that Abimelech and Phichol, the commander of his army, spoke to Abraham, saying, 'God is with you in all that you do.'"

questions.text: According to the Bible, what bird is cruel to her young?
questions.explanation:
Ostrich.

	Job 39:13-17. Thanks for playing my quiz! If you really like fascinating Bible facts, I highly recommend "The Awesome Book of Bible Trivia" by Bob Phillips. If you have any comments or suggestions, I would love to hear from you!
